subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Robert Day, the career scoring leader at Western Oregon, turned to teams in Mexico and Brazil when an N.B.A. career did not materialize. At 33, he will take the floor at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Robert Day, the career scoring leader at Western Oregon, turned to teams in Mexico and Brazil when an N.B.A. career did not materialize. At 33, he will take the floor at Madison Square Garden.
